home.title: QRMeal Restaurant

home.visitDescription: We're conveniently located in the heart of the city. Come experience the best Vietnamese cuisine!

home.footerTagline: Bringing the authentic taste of Vietnam to your table since 2010

scanQR.title: Scan QR Code
scanQR.subtitle: Scan the QR code on the table to start ordering
scanQR.reservedForYou: This table is reserved for you
scanQR.aimCamera: Aim the camera at the QR code on the table
scanQR.manualEntryDesc: If you can't scan the QR code, you can enter the URL manually
scanQR.step1: 1. Find the QR code on your table
scanQR.step2: 2. Press "Start Scanning" and point the camera at the QR code
scanQR.step3: 3. Keep the camera steady until the scan is successful
scanQR.step4: 4. If the scan fails, you can enter the URL or table code manually
scanQR.step5: 5. The system will check the validity of the table and go to the menu
scanQR.errorCamera: Cannot access camera. Please check access rights.
scanQR.errorInvalidQR: The QR code URL is invalid. Please try again.
scanQR.errorTableNotExist: The scanned table does not exist. Please check the QR code and try again.
scanQR.errorInvalidToken: The token is invalid. Please use the official QR code from the restaurant.
scanQR.errorTableUnavailable: This table is currently unavailable. Please contact staff.
scanQR.errorTableReserved: This table is already reserved. Please contact staff if you are the reserver.
scanQR.errorProcessing: An error occurred while processing the QR code. Please try again.
